name: Cuadraditos - Little Squares 2
description:
Little Squares 2 is a strategy puzzle game.

The game let you play around three worlds: the city, the mountain and the beach. Each world has their own little squares.

You have to convert all the orange squares. The rule is easy: you only can press the orange square that is adjacent to the blue one.

But there aren't only two type of squares. You will find facedown, guided, pink, yellow,...

120 levels are ready for you.

Finally, you will unlock funny extras when you pass some levels.
